biotools.summary:
The PreciseDose system represents the first integrated computational environment combining classical pharmacokinetic–pharmacodynamic modeling with quantum-biological digital twin simulation.
It enables organ-level prediction of drug absorption and distribution through AI-assisted algorithms and real-time numerical solvers.
The system has been validated using external pharmacokinetic datasets and benchmarked against established models (Teoreler data).
Outputs include physiologically accurate dose simulations and interactive 3D distribution maps.
This record introduces a novel multidisciplinary advancement in precision pharmacology and computational medicine.
